name: Galaxy Blaster (itch) (galesew1)
description:
This is my 2D shooter project. 

Modifications:

3 Unique levels with different music, background, and environment (Planets, Blackholes, and Space Stations).

New 4th Level that includes a boss fight. The level also has its own music, background and environment.

New enemy: Alien Ship. It is bigger has more health, and a faster fire rate. 

Credits:

Created By: Ryan Galesewicz
